attributes.action: come clean on whether global warming is caused by humans or is just a natural event.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: it said by the worlds leading scientists that 'global warming' is nothing more than a taxable con. accepted is the fact the earth is warming, but not by the use of fossil fuels. humans account for 0.04% of all carbon dioxide.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
